name: Companhia Siderúrgica Nacional
description: Companhia Siderúrgica Nacional (CSN) is one of the largest steel producers in Brazil and a significant player in the global steel market. Founded in 1941, CSN operates a fully integrated steel production process, including mining, steelmaking, and the distribution of steel products. The company is headquartered in Volta Redonda, Rio de Janeiro, and has established itself as a leader in the production of flat steel products, as well as long steel products, making it a vital supplier to various industries, including construction, automotive, and consumer goods. In addition to steel production, CSN has diversified operations in cement, logistics, and mining, including iron ore and gold extraction. The company is committed to sustainable practices and invests in technology and innovation to reduce its environmental impact while enhancing production efficiency. With a focus on quality, customer satisfaction, and operational excellence, CSN continues to expand its market presence both domestically and internationally. The company’s mission is to create value for its stakeholders through responsible and sustainable business practices while contributing to the development of the communities where it operates.
headquarters: Volta Redonda, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
